mapper.select: SELECT id,title,picture,channel_id,category_id,user_id,hits,commentCnt,created FROM cms_article WHERE deleted=0 AND status=1 AND hot=1 ORDER BY created DESC
SELECT id,title,picture,channel_id,category_id,user_id,hits,commentCnt,created,articleType FROM cms_article WHERE deleted=0 AND status=1 AND articleType=1 ORDER BY created DESC LIMIT #{value}
SELECT * FROM cms_article WHERE id=#{value} AND deleted=0 AND status=1
SELECT id,title,picture,channel_id,category_id,hits,commentCnt,created,status FROM cms_article WHERE deleted=0 AND user_id=#{value} ORDER BY created DESC
select b.* from cms_favorite a left join cms_article b on a.article_id=b.id where a.user_id=#{id}
SELECT * FROM cms_article WHERE id=#{value} AND deleted=0
